languages.text: "Ты сейчас пытаешься купить меня или оскорбить, а, {name}? Богатства и власть — все это у меня в избытке. Как и безмерная скука. Я столько повидал в жизни, что пресытился всяческими удовольствиями. Лишь кровь врагов на руках может заставить меня вновь чувствовать себя живым".

traits.locale_text: "Ты сейчас пытаешься купить меня или оскорбить, а, {name}? Богатсва и власть — все это у меня в избытке. Как и безмерная скука. Я столько повидал в жизни, что пресытился всяческими удовольствиями. Лишь кровь врагов на руках может заставить меня вновь чувствовать себя живым".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Are you trying to buy me or insult me, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I have seen many things in my time. I have tried everything there is to try, and now I am surfeited with any pleasure that exists out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."
languages.original_text: "Ты сейчас пытаешься купить меня или оскорбить, а, {name}? Богатства и власть — все это у меня в избытке. Как и безмерная скука. Я столько повидал в жизни, что пресытился всяческими удовольствиями. Лишь кровь врагов на руках может заставить меня вновь чувствовать себя живым".

traits.locale_text: "Are you trying to buy me or to insult me, huh, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I've had seen so much and tried everything there is to try that I an surfeited with any pleasure out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

I've seen so much and I have tried everything there is to try that I am surfeited with any pleasure out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."

I've seen so much and I have tried everything there is to try that I am surfeited with any pleasure out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."

traits.locale_text: "Are you trying to buy me or insult me, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I have seen many things in my time. I have tried everything there is to try, and now I am surfeited with any pleasure that exists out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Are you trying to buy me or insult me, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I have seen many things in my time. I have tried everything there is to try, and now I am surfeited with any pleasure that exists out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «¿Está intentando comprarme o insultarme, {name}? Tengo dinero y poder más que suficientes. Y me aburro infinitamente. He visto muchas cosas, he probado todo cuanto puede probarse. Tanto que ningún placer mundano me satisface ya. Lo único que hace que me sienta vivo es mancharme las manos con la sangre de mis enemigos».
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to buy me or insult me, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I have seen many things in my time. I have tried everything there is to try, and now I am surfeited with any pleasure that exists out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."

traits.locale_text: «¿Está intentando comprarme o insultarme, {name}? Tengo dinero y poder más que suficientes. Y me aburro infinitamente. He visto tantas cosas, he probado todo cuanto puede probarse, que ningún placer mundano me satisface ya. Lo único que hace que me sienta vivo es mancharme las manos con la sangre de mis enemigos».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “{name}，你是想收买我，还是想侮辱我，嗯？我可不缺金钱和权力，更是无聊得要死。我见识过了太多东西，也试过所有可以尝试的东西，我已经厌倦了一切形式的娱乐。只有敌人的鲜血沾满我的手掌时，我才有活着的感觉。”
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to buy me or insult me, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I have seen many things in my time. I have tried everything there is to try, and now I am surfeited with any pleasure that exists out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，你是想收买我，还是想侮辱我，嗯？我可不缺金钱和权力，我更不缺无聊。我见识过了太多东西，也试过所有可以尝试的东西，我已经厌倦了一切形式的娱乐。只有敌人的鲜血沾满我的手掌时，我才有活着的感觉。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Vous essayez de m'acheter ou de m'insulter, {name} ? J'ai plus qu'assez d'argent et de pouvoir, et je m'ennuie à mourir. J'ai vu et vécu tant de choses, je me suis gavé de tous les plaisirs possibles et imaginables, jusqu'à ce qu'il ne me reste plus que la lassitude. Le seul moment où je me sens vraiment vivant, c'est quand j'ai le sang de mes ennemis sur les mains. »
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to buy me or insult me, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I have seen many things in my time. I have tried everything there is to try, and now I am surfeited with any pleasure that exists out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."

traits.locale_text: « Vous essayez de m'acheter ou de m'insulter, {name} ? J'ai plus qu'assez d'argent et de pouvoir, et je m'ennuie à mourir. J'ai vu et vécu tant de choses, je me suis gavé de tous les plaisirs possibles et imaginables, jusqu'à ce qu'il ne me reste plus que la lassitude. Le seul moment où je me sens vraiment vivant, c'est quand j'ai le sang de mes ennemis sur les mains. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「俺を買っているのか、それとも侮辱しようとしているのか…どっちだ、{name}？俺には、あまりあるほどの金も力もある。そして無限の退屈もな。俺は多くのものを見てきたし、あらゆる存在することを試してきた。俺が生きていると感じられるのは、この手に敵の血が流れている時だけだ」
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to buy me or insult me, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I have seen many things in my time. I have tried everything there is to try, and now I am surfeited with any pleasure that exists out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."

traits.locale_text: 「俺を買っているのか、それとも侮辱しようとしているのか…どっちだ、{name}？俺には、あまりあるほどの金も力もある。そして無限の退屈もな。俺は多くのものを見てきたし、あらゆる存在することを試してきた。俺が生きていると感じられるのは、この手に敵の血が流れている時だけだ」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr mich kaufen oder mich beleidigen, {name}? Ich habe mehr als genug Geld und Macht. Und endlose Langeweile. Ich habe in meinem Leben viel gesehen. Ich habe alles probiert, was es zu probieren gibt, und nun bleiben mir keinerlei Vergnügungen mehr. Lebendig kann ich mich nur noch fühlen, wenn das Blut meiner Feinde an meinen Händen klebt."
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to buy me or insult me, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I have seen many things in my time. I have tried everything there is to try, and now I am surfeited with any pleasure that exists out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr mich kaufen oder mich beleidigen, hm, {name}? Ich habe mehr als genug Geld und Macht. Und endlose Langeweile. Ich habe so viel gesehen und alles probiert, was es zu probieren gibt, dass mir keinerlei Vergnügungen mehr bleiben. Lebendig kann ich mich nur noch fühlen, wenn das Blut meiner Feinde an meinen Händen klebt."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Beni satın almaya mı çalışıyorsun yoksa aşağılamaya mı {name}? Yeteri kadar param da var gücüm de. Sıkılmamın ise sonu gelmiyor. Ömrüm boyunca pek çok şey gördüm. Denenecek ne varsa denedim ve artık mevcut olan tüm zevklere tıka basa doymuş bir hâldeyim. Bana yaşadığımı hissettiren tek şey, elimi düşmanlarımın kanına bulamak."
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to buy me or insult me, {name}? I have more than enough money and power. And infinite boredom. I have seen many things in my time. I have tried everything there is to try, and now I am surfeited with any pleasure that exists out there. The only thing that can make me feel alive is the blood of my enemies on my hands."
